title: Day 104: The Priestly Prayer of Jesus (2021)
author: Ascension
itunes:author: Ascension
itunes:subtitle: Fr. Mike reflects on the prayer of Jesus before his sacrifice, where he not only prays for all his disciples but for us as well.
